STIG Manager TLS¶

To support TLS connections to the API, it is expected that STIG Manager would be deployed behind a reverse proxy providing this service, or in a Kubernetes environment where this service would be provided by K8 Ingress.

STIG Manager with nginx for TLS¶

The STIG Manager OSS team maintains a repository on GitHub with a sample nginx deployment, with a configuration file that may be useful to those setting up a Production deployment:

https://github.com/NUWCDIVNPT/stig-manager-docker-compose

https://github.com/NUWCDIVNPT/stig-manager-docker-compose/tree/main/tls/nginx
